    • getChoice

      public static int getChoice() throws java.lang.Exception

      Returns:
      int because
      Throws:

    • isSameUser

      public static boolean isSameUser​(java.util.List<Users> usersList, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String name, boolean isUserTheSame)
      this method checks the presence of a user in the userList thanks to a "for each" loop
      Parameters:
      usersList - list of users
      firstName - list of firstname sof users
      name - list of names
      isUserTheSame - boolean
      Returns:
      boolean isUserThesame => true means the user was detetced in the list during the loop
